EmailTemplate.name: 201909_BK_Webinar_AeroVue_Touch_Install_MC.201909_BK_Webinar_AeroVue_Touch_Insta
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Webinar tomorrow on AeroVue Touch panel upgrade on a Cessna 182
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
<[[http://www.socialflight.com/#reg]]> WEBINAR Case Study: BendixKing's AeroVue Touch panel upgrade on a Cessna 182 Date: Tuesday, October 1, 8pm ET
Have you registered yet? Don’t miss tomorrow’s webinar to learn about one of the first production installations of the AeroVue Touch on a 182, including the panel planning process, installation tips, lessons learned and whether the AeroVue Touch might be the right choice for your next panel upgrade. Join BendixKing Product Marketing Manager and avid pilot, Steven Pearce, along with SocialFlight President, Jeff Simon, an A&P/IA mechanic, as they discuss how engine monitoring can be a key diagnostic tool to help spot trends and issues before they escalate to safety of flight issues. Topics Include:
- Review of the BendixKing AeroVue Touch system - Integration considerations - Panel planning - Tips and tricks - Installation lessons
Produced in association with SocialFlight.com <[[http://www.socialflight.com/search.php]]>, your webinar registration includes FREE access to information on over 10,000 aviation events, destinations, airport restaurants, contests and more listed on SocialFlight.com, the SocialFlight mobile apps and Local Aviation Event Planner.
REGISTER HERE <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/5156904549576816651]]>
